CustomField.formula: IF(VALUE(MID(SD_Time__c, 12, 2)) >= 12, IF(VALUE(MID(SD_Time__c, 12, 2)) = 12, "12", TEXT(VALUE(MID(SD_Time__c, 12, 2)) - 12)), TEXT(VALUE(MID(SD_Time__c, 12, 2)))) & ":" & MID(SD_Time__c, 15, 2) & IF(VALUE(MID(SD_Time__c, 12, 2)) >= 12, " PM", " AM") & "-" & IF(VALUE(MID(ED_Time__c, 12, 2)) >= 12, IF(VALUE(MID(ED_Time__c, 12, 2)) = 12, "12", TEXT(VALUE(MID(ED_Time__c, 12, 2)) - 12)), TEXT(VALUE(MID(ED_Time__c, 12, 2)))) & ":" & MID(ED_Time__c, 15, 2) & IF(VALUE(MID(ED_Time__c, 12, 2)) >= 12, " PM", " AM")
CustomField.label: Time Slot Formatted
